actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to prohibit the shipment of classified information or material on vessels of Communist countries.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to prohibit the shipment of certain classified information or material on vessels of Communist countries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to prohibit the shipment of classified information or material on vessels of Communist countries.
